content: you can help support more free video tutorial by purchasing the written pdf pattern link to free tutorial is above & at the bottom of this description look for a new crochet autumn hat video crochet leaf stitch hat is perfect for the winter and fall season a simple crochet spike stitch adds the leaf effect you see on the brim of the hat it is a great crochet hat for women i m always looking for cool crochet stitches for hats and this crochet leaf stitch pattern was perfect it is an easy crochet hat pattern also known as the crochet spike stitch i may even make a few more leaf stitch tutorial for another project
